titles.title: Certified Development Company Program Improvements Act of 2000
Providing for the concurrence by the House with an amendment in the amendment of the Senate to H.R. 2614.

action.text: Mrs. Kelly moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 533.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/27/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 2614 (certified development company program revisions).
